channel.title: TypeScript on Bruno Scopelliti
channel.description: Recent content in TypeScript on Bruno Scopelliti

item.title: What's the difference between undefined and void in TypeScript?
item.description: If I have to describe my relationship with TypeScript in one word, I’ll say it is complicated. To put it shortly, I think most of the time it’s not worth the additional work, and headaches it causes - especially considering that in my usual setup I’ve unit test with high coverage, and meaningful JSDoc annotations. If you disagree - don’t worry, it’s fine ðŸ™‚ Anyway, in recent years TypeScript has grown in popularity, and always more often I find it in my way.
